targets.query:
from(bucket: "circl-monitoring")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance"] == "${instance}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "MISP")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["scope"] == "diagnostic" and r["diagnostic_scope"] == "version")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
      r["_field"] == "version"
  )
  |> last()

from(bucket: "circl-monitoring")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance"] == "${instance}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "MISP")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["scope"] == "data_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
      r["_field"] == "event_count"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: max)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)

from(bucket: "circl-monitoring")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance"] == "${instance}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "MISP")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["scope"] == "data_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
      r["_field"] == "object_count"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: max)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)

from(bucket: "circl-monitoring")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance"] == "${instance}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "MISP")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["scope"] == "data_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
      r["_field"] == "attribute_count"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: max)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)

from(bucket: "circl-monitoring")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance"] == "${instance}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "MISP")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["scope"] == "data_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
      r["_field"] == "proposal_count"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: max)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)

from(bucket: "circl-monitoring")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance"] == "${instance}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "MISP")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["scope"] == "data_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
      r["_field"] == "correlation_count"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: max)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)

from(bucket: "circl-monitoring")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance"] == "${instance}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "MISP")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["scope"] == "data_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
      r["_field"] == "user_count"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: max)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)
  |> group()

from(bucket: "circl-monitoring")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance"] == "${instance}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "MISP")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["scope"] == "data_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
      r["_field"] == "org_count"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: max)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)

from(bucket: "circl-monitoring")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance"] == "${instance}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "MISP")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["scope"] == "open_self_registration")
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: max)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)

from(bucket: "circl-monitoring")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance"] == "${instance}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "MISP")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["scope"] == "data_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
      r["_field"] == "event_count" or
      r["_field"] == "attribute_count" or
      r["_field"] == "object_count" or
      r["_field"] == "correlation_count" or
      r["_field"] == "proposal_count"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: max)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)

from(bucket: "circl-monitoring")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance"] == "${instance}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "MISP")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["scope"] == "data_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
      r["_field"] == "average_user_per_org"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: max)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)
  |> group()

from(bucket: "circl-monitoring")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance"] == "${instance}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "MISP")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["scope"] == "data_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
      r["_field"] == "user_count" or
      r["_field"] == "user_count_pgp"
  )
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(
      fn: (r) => ({
          _time: r._time,
          _field: "Ratio",
          _value: float(v: r.user_count_pgp) / float(v: r.user_count) * 100.0,
      }),
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: max)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)
  |> group()

from(bucket: "circl-monitoring")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance"] == "${instance}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "MISP")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["scope"] == "data_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
      r["_field"] == "contributing_org_count" or
      r["_field"] == "org_count"
  )
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(
      fn: (r) => ({
          _time: r._time,
          _field: "Ratio",
          _value: float(v: r.contributing_org_count) / float(v: r.org_count) * 100.0,
      }),
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: max)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)
  |> group()

from(bucket: "circl-monitoring")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance"] == "${instance}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "MISP")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["scope"] == "data_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
      r["_field"] == "org_count" or
      r["_field"] == "local_org_count"
  )
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(
      fn: (r) => ({
          _time: r._time,
          _field: "Ratio",
          _value: float(v: r.local_org_count) / float(v: r.org_count) * 100.0,
      }),
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: max)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)
  |> group()

from(bucket: "circl-monitoring")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance"] == "${instance}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "MISP")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["scope"] == "logins")
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: count, createEmpty: true)

from(bucket: "circl-monitoring")
  |> range(start: today())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance"] == "${instance}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "MISP")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["scope"] == "benchmark" and r["benchmark_scope"] == "endpoint")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["benchmark_field"] == "time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "daily_time")
  |> group(columns: ["endpoint"])
  |> max(column: "_value")
  |> group()
  |> top(n: 5)

from(bucket: "circl-monitoring")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance"] == "${instance}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "MISP" and r["scope"] == "logins")
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: count, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "circl-monitoring")
  |> range(start: today())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance"] == "${instance}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "MISP")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["scope"] == "benchmark" and r["benchmark_scope"] == "endpoint")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["benchmark_field"] == "sql_time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "sql_time")
  |> group(columns: ["endpoint"])
  |> max(column: "_value")
  |> group()
  |> top(n: 5)

from(bucket: "circl-monitoring")
  |> range(start: today())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance"] == "${instance}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "MISP")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["scope"] == "benchmark" and r["benchmark_scope"] == "endpoint")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["benchmark_field"] == "memory")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "memory")
  |> group(columns: ["endpoint"])
  |> max(column: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 1024}))
  |> group()
  |> top(n: 5)

from(bucket: "circl-monitoring")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance"] == "${instance}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "MISP")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["scope"] == "diagnostic" and r["diagnostic_scope"] == "redis_info")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r["_field"] == "used_memory" or
    r["_field"] == "used_memory_peak" or
    r["_field"] == "db_13_keys"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: max)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)

from(bucket: "circl-monitoring")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance"] == "${instance}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "MISP")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["scope"] == "diagnostic" and r["diagnostic_scope"] == "workers")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r["_field"] == "cache_job_count" or
    r["_field"] == "default_job_count" or
    r["_field"] == "email_job_count" or
    r["_field"] == "prio_job_count" or
    r["_field"] == "update_job_count"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: max)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)
